mapper.select: SELECT order_id AS id, created_date AS createdDate, customer_id AS customerId, delivery_date AS deliveryDate, description AS description, total_price AS totalPrice, date AS date FROM orders

SELECT o.order_id AS id, o.created_date AS createdDate, o.delivery_date AS deliveryDate, o.description AS description, o.total_price AS totalPrice, c.name AS customerName, c.phone AS customerPhone FROM orders o LEFT JOIN customer c ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id ORDER BY order_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT order_detail_id AS id, lamp AS name, price AS price, number AS number, description AS description FROM order_detail WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT order_id AS id, created_date AS createdDate, delivery_date AS deliveryDate, description AS description, total_price AS totalPrice FROM orders WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY order_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT count(*) FROM orders WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY order_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(created_date, customer_id, delivery_date, description, total_price) VALUES(#{createdDate}, #{customerId}, #{deliveryDate}, #{description}, #{totalPrice})
INSERT INTO order_detail(lamp, `number`, price, order_id, description) VALUES(#{name}, #{number}, #{price}, #{orderId}, #{description})
